TextView.android:text: Preventive Maintenance Schedule : Six-Monthly \n ASMGCS SAAB
Physical Inspection and Cleaning of System Carried out
Physical inspection of SMR Waveguide and Connections
Physical check of all Pedestal Nut and Bolt of SMR
Power Supply cables connecting all servers
Optical Fiber Pigtails connection on all converters, OFC Rack
Check encoder 1 and 2 connections: \n Performance check of Encoder 1 an 2 (Redundancy check)
Antenna motor assembly Gearbox oil Level Check. Fill the oil up to right level if oil level is low. (Note: Gearbox oil must be replaced every 4-8 years)
Physical Inspection and Cleaning of SMR Antenna Radome.
SMR UPS (Physical Inspection and Cleaning of System)
